name: CruciRilla Crosswords
description:
This is Crosswords Generator.

A prototype project, still under development.

Using a huge English vocabulary (reference :  https://github.com/dwyl/english-words) the app take random words and generate crossword of 3 different types.

At the moment there are several mistakes in the procedure and some words are not correct.

The idea is also to release a new type of Crossword that I will release when the generator is ready.
